name: A Front Too Far: Normandy
description: A World War 2 Game in a Open World RPG Style!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia gt 730 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia gtx 1050 ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
